meanings.definition: A class of cold-blooded vertebrates that includes frogs, toads, and salamanders.
meanings.sent1: Many children enjoy learning about batrachians in science class.
meanings.sent2: The pond was filled with various batrachians hopping around.
meanings.sent3: The batrachians decided to have a hopping competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet night, the croaking of the batrachians filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The slimy skin of the batrachians felt cool to the touch.
